amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.para: Measure means an ordinance, charter provision, or resolution which is within the legislative authority of the governing body of a municipality to pass and which is not excluded from the operation of referendum by the exceptions in section 18-2528. Measure does not include any action permitted by the Nebraska Advantage Transformational Tourism and Redevelopment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Advantage Transformational Tourism and Redevelopment Act, see section 77-1001.
